name: The_Stand
text:
The Stand
The Stand was a book written by Stephen King.
A favorite of Lucy Brennan, a copy of the book was kept at the Bookhouse.
Behind the scenes
The Stand is a 1978 post-apocalyptic dark fantasy novel by Stephen King.
A miniseries adaptation featuring Miguel Ferrer, Warren Frost, and Troy Evans was released in 1994. Heather Graham is set to appear in an upcoming adaptation.
